rukus.text: dangnan phu dı prakxb krrm di thanghlay doythi khea pen phu sraththa sahrab kar xutsaha wiriya khxng khea ca mi thuk ptiseth læa thæcring rea pen phu banthuk khwam di sahrab khea
læa pen thi ham kæ chaw meuxng thi rea di thalay meuxng nan læw wa nænxn phwk khea ca mi klab fun khunchiph khun ma xik
Cnkrathang meux yaxˌyucy læa maxˌyucy thuk plxy xxk ma cak kaphæng læa phwk khea ca hlanghil kanlng ma cak thuk thisthang

læa meux sayya hæng khwam cring di kıl khea ma khna nan reuxng khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa khux sayta khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa ca cxng khemng læw klaw wa xo khwam hayna khxng rea nænxn ying rea xyu nı khwam hlnglum (cak thang hlab thi na klaw ni) ying kwa nan rea yang pen phu xthrrm xik dwy
thæcring phwk cea (mu chrikin) læa sing thi phwk cea khearph bucha xun ca kxallxhˌ nan thanghmd nan pen cheuxpheling khxng nrk doy phwk cea ca kheapi xyu nı nan
hak man hela nan pen phracea cring læw man ca mi kheapi xyu nı nan læa thanghmd ca khea xyu nı nan xyang thawr
sahrab phwk khea nı nrk nan mi tæ seiyng khrwykhrang læa phwk khea nı nrk nan ca mi diyin man ley
thæcring brrda phu thi khwam di cak rea di prasb kæ phwk khea ma kxn nan chn hela nan pen phu thi xyu hang kil cak man
phwk khea ca mi diyin mætæ seiyng phæw bea khxng man læa phwk khea ca xyu nı swn swrrkh xyang thawr tam thi citcı khxng phwk khea prarthna
khwam tun trahnk xan ying hıy ca mi thahı phwk khea sera sok læa mla xik ahˌ ca phb phwk khea læw klaw wa ni khux wan khxng phwk than sung phwk than di thuk sayya wi

wan sung rea ca mwn chan fa prahnung kar mwn phæn kradasʹ sahrab kar banthuk dang chen thi rea di reim hı mi kar bangkeid khrang ræk rea ca hı man klab pen khun ma xik pen sayya phukphan kab rea thæcring rea pen phu kratha xyang nænxn
læa thæcring nan rea di banthuk wi nı khamphir xas sa bur hlangcak thi rea di banthuk wi nı luhˌ mahˌ fu s wa phændin nan pwng baw khxng rea thi di mi khunthrrm ca pen phu sub mrdk man
thæcring nı kar klaw wi chen ni penkar pheiyngphx sahrab hmu chn thi khearph phakdi tx xallxhˌ
læa rea midi sng cea ma pheux xun dı nxkcak pheux pen khwam metta kæ prachachati thanghlay
Cng klaw theid (muhammad) thæcring chan di rab wa hiyˌ ma hı prakas wa thæcring phracea khxng phwk than nan khux phracea xngkh deiyw dangnan phwk than yang mi yxm nxbnxm xik hrux
hak phwk khea phinhlanghı k cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa chan di prakas cæng hı phwk than thrab læw doy thwn hna læa chan miru wa sing thi phwk than thuk sayya wi nan ca xyu kıl hrux kil
thæcring phraxngkh thrng rxbru kha phud thi peidphey læa thrng rxbru sing thi phwk than pidbang wi
læa chan k miru hwang wakar prawing wela xac ca penkar thdsxb kæ phwk than læa xac ca penkar rareing chaw khna hnung

khea (muhammad) klaw wa kha tæ phraphupenceakhxng kha phraxngkh khx phraxngkh thrng chikhad tadsin kæ rea dwy khwam cring læa phracea khxng rea khux phra phuthrng kruna prani phuthrng thuk khx khwam chwyhelux tx sing thi phwk than klawha
